short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improving Anaplan User & Model Builder Experience and increasing efficiency. Brought to you by valantic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Works in both Chrome and Edge.

Introducing Improved Anaplan: Unlock Your Anaplan & Anaplan Model Building Potential!

Are you tired of repetitive tasks and the endless clicking in the Anaplan Web Application? Do you wish for a smoother, more efficient model building experience? Look no further! Improved Anaplan is a powerful Chrome extension designed to drastically improve your workflow and supercharge your productivity within the Anaplan environment.

Streamline your Anaplan experience with the Improved Anaplan Chrome extension! Enjoy faster model building with these features:

1. Keyboard Shortcuts: Accelerate your Anaplan workflow with comprehensive shortcuts. Navigate and edit without constantly switching between mouse and keyboard.

2. Page and Report Analysis: Quickly find pages referencing a module or identify filter variables in Anaplan reports with our efficient search feature.

3. AI-powered Formula Assistance: Enhance your formula writing in Anaplan with ChatGPT's smart suggestions and contextual guidance.

4. Formula Editor Enhancements: Our improved formula editor in Anaplan comes with informative tooltips for a smoother experience.

5. Enhanced Popup Windows: Navigate Anaplan popups easily with focus traversable and stylish elements, including Tab-accessible confirm buttons.

6. Custom Styling: Apply custom styling to Anaplan module line items for easier navigation.

7. Collapsible Configuration Cards: In Anaplan's Apps & Dashboards, use our spoiler feature to make lengthy configuration cards collapsible.

Download the Improved Anaplan Extension for a more efficient, productive, and enjoyable Anaplan model building experience.

You can customise the extension by turning most features on or off in the extension settings.

For any feedback, suggestions, bugs, or general enquiries, please do not hesitate to contact anaplan-integration@ba.valantic.com.
